channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Organizing for urgent
item.description: There are many ways to prioritize our time and focus, but the easiest and most vivid way is to do the urgent things first. If we wait until a house pl...

item.title: Reuters’ New Cozy Game Is Part Of A Long History Of Games About Games
item.description: Scholars, journalists, and creators are turning towards games as a genre for talking about the cultural significance of gaming.

item.title: Here’s How Netflix’s ‘The Recruit’ Season 2 Is Being Scored By Critics
item.description: The Recruit is back for season 2 and it's being well-received by critics so far. Here's how it compares to season 1.

item.title: Getting clear about brand value
item.description: Consulting firms rank brands on value. Marketers promise to increase it. But brand value has little to do with whether a company is famous or even pro...

item.title: New Browser Syncjacking Attack Gives Hackers Full Device Control
item.description: Hackers can use Syncjacking to hijack Google accounts through malicious extensions, stealing passwords and browsing data. Learn how it works and how t...

item.title: Analysis = Facts + Interpretation
item.description: If you fail to show us the facts, it’s difficult to accept your analysis. While it’s tempting to simply share an interpretation of what’s happening, c...

item.title: Medical Records Stolen As 1 Million Patients Hit By Healthcare Hack
item.description: U.S. healthcare provider Community Health Center has confirmed the breach of 1 million patient records. Here’s what you need to know.

item.title: What’s for breakfast?

item.title: What sort of progress?
